episodes.title: The Demonic Faaite Incident
episodes.description:
In 1987, a remote island in French Polynesia descended into chaos. What began as prayer meetings soon spiraled into a cult of fear, possession, and fire. Ordinary villagers became convinced their neighbors — even family members — were demons in disguise. 

This is the chilling true story of the Faaite incident — a case of religious mania, witch hunts, and exorcism gone horrifyingly wrong.


Gaming Channel: https://www.youtube.com/@shroudedgames

episodes.title: True Stories of Terrifying Death Cults
episodes.description:
From Californian mansions to sheds in the deepest Panamanian jungle, deadly cults operate all around the world. I take a look at some of the scariest cults to ever exist...and who might still be operating today. 

Check out Emmendal and Sixrabbits instagrams!
https://www.instagram.com/emmendal
https://www.instagram.com/thesixrabbits
